IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: EPI OFFERS HANDS-ON SCIENCE EDUCATION, CONSERVATION IMPACT, AND CULTURAL EXCHANGE OPPORTUNITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ECOLOGY PROJECT INTERNATIONAL'S MISSION IS TO IMPROVE AND INSPIRE SCIENCE EDUCATION AND CONSERVATION EFFORTS WORLDWIDE THROUGH FIELD-BASED STUDENT-SCIENTIST PARTNERSHIPS.
IRS990.Desc: ECUADOR - IN THE GALAPAGOS, EPI PARTNERS WITH GALAPAGOS NATIONAL PARK SERVICE TO ENGAGE PARTICIPANTS IN CONSERVATION AND RESEARCH ON THE GIANT GALAPAGOS TORTOISE AND HABITAT RESTORATION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: MEXICO - EPI PARTICIPANTS MONITOR WHALE ACTIVITY IN THE SEA OF CORTEZ, COLLECT DATA ON GREEN SEA TURTLES IN MAGDALENA BAY, AND STUDY ISLAND AND INLAND ECOLOGY BOTH ON LAND AND IN THE SURROUNDING WATERS OF ESPIRITU SANTO ISLAND. EPI OPERATES A CAMPUS IN LA PAZ HOSTING VISITING AND LOCAL STUDENTS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COSTA RICA - EPI OFFERS A VARIETY OF FIELD-BASED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS FOR INTERNATIONAL AND LOCAL YOUTH, AS WELL AS LOCAL IN-SCHOOL EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMING THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY WITH A FOCUS ON THE CENTRAL VALLEY CARIBBEAN COAST COMMUNITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: YELLOWSTONE ECOSYSTEM, USA - EPI CONDUCTS FIELD-BASED LOCAL AND VISITING STUDENT CONSERVATION EDUCATION COURSES AND ALUMNI INTERNSHIP PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT MONTANA, WITH A FOCUS ON THE GREATER YELLOWSTONE ECOSYSTEM; OPERATED IN CONJUNCTION WITH STATE ENTITIES, FEDERAL AGENCIES, AND PRIVATE/NON-PROFIT PROGRAM PARTNERS.

PACUARE RESERVE, COSTA RICA - EPI MANAGES A 2,600-ACRE COASTAL LOWLAND RAINFOREST RESERVE THAT CONTAINS A RESEARCH STATION, LODGING FOR STAFF, STUDENTS, AND VISITORS, TRAILS, AND 5 KILOMETERS OF CRITICAL SEA TURTLE NESTING HABITAT.
ADMISSIONS - ADMISSIONS RECRUITS, ENROLLS, AND PURCHASES AIRFARE FOR U.S. STUDENTS TO PARTICIPATE IN EPI PROGRAMS.

HAWAII - EPI OFFERS A COMPREHENSIVE TERRESTRIAL AND MARINE RIDGE TO REEF CONSERVATION EDUCATION PROGRAM WITH REEF FISH SURVEYS, WATER QUALITY TESTING, AND RESTORATION OF CULTURAL FARMING PRACTICES. IN HAWAII, EPI WORKS IN HAWAII'S VALLEY ISLE IN MAUI TO HELP STUDENTS LEARN ABOUT HAWAII'S NATURAL WONDERS, VIBRANT WILDLIFE, AND A GROWING HUMAN POPULATION ON AN ISLAND ECOSYSTEM.
OPERATIONS AND EDUCATION - EPI DEVELOPS RISK MANAGEMENT, CURRICULUM, AND EVALUATION TOOLS IN LINE WITH INTERNATIONAL BEST PRACTICES THAT ARE DEPLOYED ACROSS ALL EPI FIELD SITES.
BELIZE - ACTIVITIES RELATED TO FIELD BASED EDUCATIONAL YOUTH PROGRAMS IN MARINE AND TERRESTRIAL ECOLOGY ACTIVES ALONG THE BARRIER REEF AND THE COCKSCOMB BASIN WILDLIFE SANCTUARY IN BELIZE.

COLORADO - ACTIVITIES RELATED TO THE OPERATION OF FIELD-BASED EDUCATION PROGRAMS IN COLORADO, WITH A FOCUS ON ROCKY MOUNTAIN NATIONAL PARK, IN PARTNERSHIP WITH RUGGED RESEARCH AND CU MOUNTAIN RESEARCH STATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EPI IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. HOWEVER, RENTAL INCOME FROM THE SWIFT CENTER IS NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO EPI'S TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSE AND IS SUBJECT TO TAXATION AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. NO AMOUNT HAS BEEN RECORDED, AS THE AMOUNT IS NOT CONSIDERED SIGNIFICANT TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TAKEN AS A WHOLE. PENALTIES AND INTEREST ASSESSED BY INCOME TAXING AUTHORITIES ARE INCLUDED IN MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES, IF APPLICABLE. EPI HAS NO INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO INCOME TAXES FOR THE PERIOD ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2022. EPI'S FEDERAL RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY ARE FILED AND ITS STATE RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY ARE FILED.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: CENTRAL AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN - ANTIGUA & BARBUDA, ARUBA, BAHAMAS,
AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.SpecificServicesProvidedTxt: STUDENT EDUCTION, ECOTOURISM, SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH AND MONITORING

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: NORTH AMERICA - CANADA AND MEXICO, BUT NOT THE UNITED STATES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OUR ORGANIZATION'S DEVELOPMENT TEAM WORKS WITH THE PROGRAM MANAGERS TO ACCURATELY BUDGET AND RECORD EXPENSES FOR GRANT.
THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS IS REPORTED IN PART I.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990, WITH THE EXCLUSION OF SCHEDULE B, IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTOR'S FINANCE COMMITTEE AND IS THEN EMAILED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO A BOARD MEETING. THE 990 IS REVIEWED AT A BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN CONNECTION WITH ANY ACTUAL OR POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST, AN INTERESTED PERSON MUST DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE OF THE FINANCIAL INTEREST AND BE GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO DISCLOSE ALL MATERIAL FACTS TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. ANY DIRECTOR MAY RECUSE HIMSELF OR HERSELF AT ANY TIME FROM INVOLVEMENT IN ANY DECISION OR DISCUSSION IN WHICH THE DIRECTOR BELIEVES HE OR SHE MAY HAVE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST, WITHOUT GOING THROUGH THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING WHETHER A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS. AFTER DISCLOSURE OF THE FINANCIAL INTEREST AND ALL MATERIAL FACTS, AND AFTER ANY DISCUSSION WITH THE INTERESTED PERSON, HE/SHE SHALL LEAVE THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MEETING WHILE THE DETERMINATION OF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS DISCUSSED AND VOTED UPON. THE REMAINING EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MEMBERS SHALL DECIDE IF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A SALARY SURVEY WAS USED IN 2022 FROM ASSOCIATED EMPLOYERS AND MONTANA NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION. THE SALARY SURVEY REVIEWED SALARIES FOR INDIVIDUALS IN SIMILAR POSITIONS WITH VARYING LEVELS OF EXPERIENCE, SIMILAR SIZE IN THE ORGANIZATION, BASED IN MONTANA. ANNUALLY IN DECEMBER, THE BOARD REVIEWS THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S PERFORMANCE AND SALARY. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWED MANAGEMENT STAFF PERFORMANCE AND SALARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON GUIDESTAR.ORG.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
